New Records: Glenn Maxwell broke the record for the fastest ever World Cup hundred by nine balls
Key Match Events: Glenn Maxwell produced one of the most astonishing displays of batting in recent times, scoring 106 off 44 balls
Australia posted a massive total of 399 before blowing away the Netherlands
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia secured a victory by a record margin of 309 runs
Zampa registered a third four-for on the trot
